definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wander, travel (Ar.z.a9ana journey, go away; prob. connected with As, ṣênu, Eth. s’a9ana:, Aram. [[טְעַן]], Palm. [[טען]], all load (beast, etc.) = Heb. [[טָעַן]] † Ge 45:17; Aram. [[טְעַן]], t.9an also bear, carry);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחְעָן]] Is 33:20 travel, i. e. be removed, of tent (+ [[יִסַּע]]).
